alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:13PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda, northwestern San Mateo, including SFO Airport, southwestern Contra Costa and southeastern San Francisco Counties through 745 PM PST... At 711 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millbrae, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Hayward, Berkeley, Daly City, San Mateo, San Leandro, Alameda, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, South San Francisco, Danville, San Bruno, Pacifica, Foster City, Burlingame, Lafayette, Millbrae, Castro Valley and San Lorenzo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
